item.title: 'I wish he was still here': Inside Klay Thompson's split from Golden State
item.description: Thompson's future is uncertain, but his friendship with Steph Curry and Draymond Green endures.

item.title: Want to beat the Oklahoma City Thunder? This five-step guide tells you how
item.description: Using the Spurs' and Trail Blazers' wins over Oklahoma City as a blueprint, let's evaluate the most important factors of a Thunder loss.
